prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Josephine Preston Peabody, Accession #8184 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on February 4, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains manuscripts of poems "Isolation" and "Old broideries," and letters, 1898 and n.d., to "Page" and "Professor Marsh" recommending poems by Frederic R. Torrence and Edwin A. Robinson, asking the correction of a misprint in "The wayfarers" and mentioning Edmund C. Stedman's "American anthology" and her poem "The trees."
Recommends poems by Frederic Ridgely Torrence and Edwin Arlington Robinson. Mentions American Anthologyby Edmund Clarence Stedman, and her poem "The Trees" in May Atlanticand the August Scribner.
